name: Serif Font on the Dash
description: Displays Serif Font on the dash
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/')
{
.post_body small sup,
.post_body small sub,
.post_body sub small,
.post_body sup small,
.post_body small,
.post_body h1,
.post_body p,
.post_body b,
.post_body i,
.post_body strong,
.post_body em,
.post_body h2,
div.xkit-better-reblogs-old.post_body > blockquote > h2,
.post_body h3,
div.xkit-better-reblogs-old.post_body > blockquote > h3,
.post_body h4,
div.xkit-better-reblogs-old.post_body > blockquote > h4,
.post_body h5,
div.xkit-better-reblogs-old.post_body > blockquote > h5,
.post_body,
.post_title,
div.editor.editor-plaintext.has-text > span,
* div.editor.editor-richtext.editor-richtext-has-text,
div.editor.editor-richtext.editor-richtext-has-text > h2,
div.post_wrapper > div.post_content.clearfix > div > div > div.post_body > h2
  {
    font-family: 'georgia', serif!important;
  }
}
